channel.title: [508] help please [508]
channel.description:
Alright i need some help with this one thing, im using a z508 base server, and everyone can spawn any item, im not trying to take that away. i only want to no how to make a few items unspawnable. like perfect ring, ags, bandos. etc could anyone help me with this, lol it has been awhile since i have asked a question on the help section i been getting pretty good at this, this seems easy but im really not to sure on how to do this! I want to make it so no one can spawn pefect ring or atleast admins plus! ;D Thank you in a head help would be really greatful !
~~Owner Bryan~~

item.title: [508] help please [508]
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Bryan Owner_Bryan
item.description:
@Owner_Bryan wrote:

No i want it so people cant spawn this item because people been spawning items i really dont want on my server enless there staff

Read full topic

item.title: [508] help please [508]
item.dc:creator: @Chromeez Chromeez
item.description:
@Chromeez wrote:

surely you just make a command like this:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("item 995") && c.playerRights >= 2) { c.addItem("995, 999999999"); c.sendMessage("You spawn 999M cash"); }

I may be completely wrong, but I’m just trying to help

Read full topic
